Name: Resting Effect
Notes: Leads to Rested Effect within 20 s.

Name: Rested Effect
Source: Resting effect for 20s, sleeping in a bed.

Name: Corpse Run
Source: Collecting any amount of items from their grave.

Name: Fire Effect
Source: Campfire, working Smelter, working Charcoal Kiln
Effects: The timer of the Wet Effect expires 10x faster    removes Cold and Freezing Effect.

Name: Shelter Effect
Effects: Character does not become wet from rain and any wet timer begins to count down.

Name: Sneaky Effect
Source: All four pieces of the Troll armor set are equipped.

Name: Wet Effect
Source: Caught in the rain. Immersed in water.

Name: Smoked
Source: Standing inside a cloud of smoke.
Effects: Damage over time (2 damage per tick).

Name: Freezing Effect
Source: Applied when in the Mountain biome.

Name: Frost Effect
Notes: Speed penalty decays exponentially over the duration of the status effect. Resistance to Frost significantly reduces the duration.

Name: Poison
Source: Greydwarf shaman, Blob, Leech, Oozer, Bonemass, Poison Arrows
Notes: Poisoned characters are surrounded by a green smoky effect, slightly luminous. Resistance to Poison halves both the damage done by poison and its duration

Name: Burning
Source: Walking into a fire. Being hit by a fireball.
Effects: Applies damage over time (2 DPS from campfires, otherwise dependent on what hits you)
The timer of the Wet Effect expires 60x faster
Notes: The flames covering the character makes them a nice source of light for a few seconds.

Name: Resistance
Effects: Possible resistances: Blunt, Slashing, Piercing, Fire, Poison, Frost, etc.
